Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Baptist:

Text.Language: <ere Iwann/c: pinis] m~p~rodromoc ,ere piou/b p~cuggen/c n~Emmanou/l.
Hail to John: the great forerunner. Hail to the priest: the kinsman of Immanuel.

<ere piq/bc n~ouwini qen p~safe m~PiIordan/c: ,ere picuggen/c n~Emmanou/l
Hail to the lit lamp: in the wilderness of the Jordan. Hail to the cousin: of Immanuel.
